00044 KX_SteeringActuator::KX_SteeringActuator(SCA_IObject *gameobj, 
00045                                          int mode,
00046                                          KX_GameObject *target,
00047                                          KX_GameObject *navmesh,
00048                                          float distance,
00049                                          float velocity,
00050                                          float acceleration,
00051                                          float turnspeed,
00052                                          bool  isSelfTerminated,
00053                                          int pathUpdatePeriod,
00054                                          KX_ObstacleSimulation* simulation,
00055                                          short facingmode,
00056                                          bool normalup,
00057                                          bool enableVisualization)
00058     : SCA_IActuator(gameobj, KX_ACT_STEERING),
00059       m_target(target),
00060       m_mode(mode),
00061       m_distance(distance),
00062       m_velocity(velocity),
00063       m_acceleration(acceleration),
00064       m_turnspeed(turnspeed),
00065       m_simulation(simulation),
00066       m_updateTime(0),
00067       m_obstacle(NULL),
00068       m_isActive(false),
00069       m_isSelfTerminated(isSelfTerminated),
00070       m_enableVisualization(enableVisualization),
00071       m_facingMode(facingmode),
00072       m_normalUp(normalup),
00073       m_pathLen(0),
00074       m_pathUpdatePeriod(pathUpdatePeriod),
00075       m_wayPointIdx(-1),
00076       m_steerVec(MT_Vector3(0, 0, 0))
00077 {
00078     m_navmesh = static_cast<KX_NavMeshObject*>(navmesh);
00079     if (m_navmesh)
00080         m_navmesh->RegisterActuator(this);
00081     if (m_target)
00082         m_target->RegisterActuator(this);
00083     
00084     if (m_simulation)
00085         m_obstacle = m_simulation->GetObstacle((KX_GameObject*)gameobj);
00086     KX_GameObject* parent = ((KX_GameObject*)gameobj)->GetParent();
00087     if (m_facingMode>0 && parent)
00088     {
00089         m_parentlocalmat = parent->GetSGNode()->GetLocalOrientation();
00090     }
00091     else
00092         m_parentlocalmat.setIdentity();
00093 } 
00094 
00095 KX_SteeringActuator::~KX_SteeringActuator()
00096 {
00097     if (m_navmesh)
00098         m_navmesh->UnregisterActuator(this);
00099     if (m_target)
00100         m_target->UnregisterActuator(this);
00101 } 
00102 
00103 CValue* KX_SteeringActuator::GetReplica()
00104 {
00105     KX_SteeringActuator* replica = new KX_SteeringActuator(*this);
00106     // replication just copy the m_base pointer => common random generator
00107     replica->ProcessReplica();
00108     return replica;
00109 }
00110 
00111 void KX_SteeringActuator::ProcessReplica()
00112 {
00113     if (m_target)
00114         m_target->RegisterActuator(this);
00115     if (m_navmesh)
00116         m_navmesh->RegisterActuator(this);
00117     SCA_IActuator::ProcessReplica();
00118 }
00119 
00120 void KX_SteeringActuator::ReParent(SCA_IObject* parent)
00121 {
00122     SCA_IActuator::ReParent(parent);
00123     if (m_simulation)
00124         m_obstacle = m_simulation->GetObstacle((KX_GameObject*)m_gameobj);
00125 }
00126 
00127 bool KX_SteeringActuator::UnlinkObject(SCA_IObject* clientobj)
00128 {
00129     if (clientobj == m_target)
00130     {
00131         m_target = NULL;
00132         return true;
00133     }
00134     else if (clientobj == m_navmesh)
00135     {
00136         m_navmesh = NULL;
00137         return true;
00138     }
00139     return false;
00140 }
00141 
00142 void KX_SteeringActuator::Relink(CTR_Map<CTR_HashedPtr, void*> *obj_map)
00143 {
00144     void **h_obj = (*obj_map)[m_target];
00145     if (h_obj) {
00146         if (m_target)
00147             m_target->UnregisterActuator(this);
00148         m_target = (KX_GameObject*)(*h_obj);
00149         m_target->RegisterActuator(this);
00150     }
00151 
00152     h_obj = (*obj_map)[m_navmesh];
00153     if (h_obj) {
00154         if (m_navmesh)
00155             m_navmesh->UnregisterActuator(this);
00156         m_navmesh = (KX_NavMeshObject*)(*h_obj);
00157         m_navmesh->RegisterActuator(this);
00158     }
00159 }
00160 
00161 bool KX_SteeringActuator::Update(double curtime, bool frame)
00162 {
00163     if (frame)
00164     {
00165         double delta =  curtime - m_updateTime;
00166         m_updateTime = curtime;
00167         
00168         if (m_posevent && !m_isActive)
00169         {
00170             delta = 0;
00171             m_pathUpdateTime = -1;
00172             m_updateTime = curtime;
00173             m_isActive = true;
00174         }
00175         bool bNegativeEvent = IsNegativeEvent();
00176         if (bNegativeEvent)
00177             m_isActive = false;
00178 
00179         RemoveAllEvents();
00180 
00181         if (!delta)
00182             return true;
00183 
00184         if (bNegativeEvent || !m_target)
00185             return false; // do nothing on negative events
00186 
00187         KX_GameObject *obj = (KX_GameObject*) GetParent();
00188         const MT_Point3& mypos = obj->NodeGetWorldPosition();
00189         const MT_Point3& targpos = m_target->NodeGetWorldPosition();
00190         MT_Vector3 vectotarg = targpos - mypos;
00191         MT_Vector3 vectotarg2d = vectotarg;
00192         vectotarg2d.z() = 0;
00193         m_steerVec = MT_Vector3(0, 0, 0);
00194         bool apply_steerforce = false;
00195         bool terminate = true;
00196 
00197         switch (m_mode) {
00198             case KX_STEERING_SEEK:
00199                 if (vectotarg2d.length2()>m_distance*m_distance)
00200                 {
00201                     terminate = false;
00202                     m_steerVec = vectotarg;
00203                     m_steerVec.normalize();
00204                     apply_steerforce = true;
00205                 }
00206                 break;
00207             case KX_STEERING_FLEE:
00208                 if (vectotarg2d.length2()<m_distance*m_distance)
00209                 {
00210                     terminate = false;
00211                     m_steerVec = -vectotarg;
00212                     m_steerVec.normalize();
00213                     apply_steerforce = true;
00214                 }
00215                 break;
00216             case KX_STEERING_PATHFOLLOWING:
00217                 if (m_navmesh && vectotarg.length2()>m_distance*m_distance)
00218                 {
00219                     terminate = false;
00220 
00221                     static const MT_Scalar WAYPOINT_RADIUS(0.25);
00222 
00223                     if (m_pathUpdateTime<0 || (m_pathUpdatePeriod>=0 && 
00224                                                 curtime - m_pathUpdateTime>((double)m_pathUpdatePeriod/1000)))
00225                     {
00226                         m_pathUpdateTime = curtime;
00227                         m_pathLen = m_navmesh->FindPath(mypos, targpos, m_path, MAX_PATH_LENGTH);
00228                         m_wayPointIdx = m_pathLen > 1 ? 1 : -1;
00229                     }
00230 
00231                     if (m_wayPointIdx>0)
00232                     {
00233                         MT_Vector3 waypoint(&m_path[3*m_wayPointIdx]);
00234                         if ((waypoint-mypos).length2()<WAYPOINT_RADIUS*WAYPOINT_RADIUS)
00235                         {
00236                             m_wayPointIdx++;
00237                             if (m_wayPointIdx>=m_pathLen)
00238                             {
00239                                 m_wayPointIdx = -1;
00240                                 terminate = true;
00241                             }
00242                             else
00243                                 waypoint.setValue(&m_path[3*m_wayPointIdx]);
00244                         }
00245 
00246                         m_steerVec = waypoint - mypos;
00247                         apply_steerforce = true;
00248 
00249                         
00250                         if (m_enableVisualization)
00251                         {
00252                             //debug draw
00253                             static const MT_Vector3 PATH_COLOR(1,0,0);
00254                             m_navmesh->DrawPath(m_path, m_pathLen, PATH_COLOR);
00255                         }
00256                     }   
00257                     
00258                 }
00259                 break;
00260         }
00261 
00262         if (apply_steerforce)
00263         {
00264             bool isdyna = obj->IsDynamic();
00265             if (isdyna)
00266                 m_steerVec.z() = 0;
00267             if (!m_steerVec.fuzzyZero())
00268                 m_steerVec.normalize();
00269             MT_Vector3 newvel = m_velocity*m_steerVec;
00270 
00271             //adjust velocity to avoid obstacles
00272             if (m_simulation && m_obstacle /*&& !newvel.fuzzyZero()*/)
00273             {
00274                 if (m_enableVisualization)
00275                     KX_RasterizerDrawDebugLine(mypos, mypos + newvel, MT_Vector3(1.0, 0.0, 0.0));
00276                 m_simulation->AdjustObstacleVelocity(m_obstacle, m_mode!=KX_STEERING_PATHFOLLOWING ? m_navmesh : NULL, 
00277                                 newvel, m_acceleration*delta, m_turnspeed/180.0f*M_PI*delta);
00278                 if (m_enableVisualization)
00279                     KX_RasterizerDrawDebugLine(mypos, mypos + newvel, MT_Vector3(0.0, 1.0, 0.0));
00280             }
00281 
00282             HandleActorFace(newvel);
00283             if (isdyna)
00284             {
00285                 //temporary solution: set 2D steering velocity directly to obj
00286                 //correct way is to apply physical force
00287                 MT_Vector3 curvel = obj->GetLinearVelocity();
00288                 newvel.z() = curvel.z();            
00289                 obj->setLinearVelocity(newvel, false);
00290             }
00291             else
00292             {
00293                 MT_Vector3 movement = delta*newvel;
00294                 obj->ApplyMovement(movement, false);
00295             }
00296         }
00297         else
00298         {
00299             if (m_simulation && m_obstacle)
00300             {
00301                 m_obstacle->dvel[0] = 0.f;
00302                 m_obstacle->dvel[1] = 0.f;
00303             }
00304             
00305         }
00306 
00307         if (terminate && m_isSelfTerminated)
00308             return false;
00309     }
00310 
00311     return true;
00312 }
00313 
00314 const MT_Vector3& KX_SteeringActuator::GetSteeringVec()
00315 {
00316     static MT_Vector3 ZERO_VECTOR(0, 0, 0);
00317     if (m_isActive)
00318         return m_steerVec;
00319     else
00320         return ZERO_VECTOR;
00321 }
00322 
00323 inline float vdot2(const float* a, const float* b)
00324 {
00325     return a[0]*b[0] + a[2]*b[2];
00326 }
00327 static bool barDistSqPointToTri(const float* p, const float* a, const float* b, const float* c)
00328 {
00329     float v0[3], v1[3], v2[3];
00330     rcVsub(v0, c,a);
00331     rcVsub(v1, b,a);
00332     rcVsub(v2, p,a);
00333 
00334     const float dot00 = vdot2(v0, v0);
00335     const float dot01 = vdot2(v0, v1);
00336     const float dot02 = vdot2(v0, v2);
00337     const float dot11 = vdot2(v1, v1);
00338     const float dot12 = vdot2(v1, v2);
00339 
00340     // Compute barycentric coordinates
00341     float invDenom = 1.0f / (dot00 * dot11 - dot01 * dot01);
00342     float u = (dot11 * dot02 - dot01 * dot12) * invDenom;
00343     float v = (dot00 * dot12 - dot01 * dot02) * invDenom;
00344 
00345     float ud = u<0.f ? -u : (u>1.f ? u-1.f : 0.f);
00346     float vd = v<0.f ? -v : (v>1.f ? v-1.f : 0.f);
00347     return ud * ud + vd * vd;
00348 }
00349 
00350 inline void flipAxes(float* vec)
00351 {
00352     std::swap(vec[1],vec[2]);
00353 }
00354 
00355 static bool getNavmeshNormal(dtStatNavMesh* navmesh, const MT_Vector3& pos, MT_Vector3& normal)
00356 {
00357     static const float polyPickExt[3] = {2, 4, 2};
00358     float spos[3];
00359     pos.getValue(spos); 
00360     flipAxes(spos); 
00361     dtStatPolyRef sPolyRef = navmesh->findNearestPoly(spos, polyPickExt);
00362     if (sPolyRef == 0)
00363         return false;
00364     const dtStatPoly* p = navmesh->getPoly(sPolyRef-1);
00365     const dtStatPolyDetail* pd = navmesh->getPolyDetail(sPolyRef-1);
00366 
00367     float distMin = FLT_MAX;
00368     int idxMin = -1;
00369     for (int i = 0; i < pd->ntris; ++i)
00370     {
00371         const unsigned char* t = navmesh->getDetailTri(pd->tbase+i);
00372         const float* v[3];
00373         for (int j = 0; j < 3; ++j)
00374         {
00375             if (t[j] < p->nv)
00376                 v[j] = navmesh->getVertex(p->v[t[j]]);
00377             else
00378                 v[j] = navmesh->getDetailVertex(pd->vbase+(t[j]-p->nv));
00379         }
00380         float dist = barDistSqPointToTri(spos, v[0], v[1], v[2]);
00381         if (dist<distMin)
00382         {
00383             distMin = dist;
00384             idxMin = i;
00385         }           
00386     }
00387 
00388     if (idxMin>=0)
00389     {
00390         const unsigned char* t = navmesh->getDetailTri(pd->tbase+idxMin);
00391         const float* v[3];
00392         for (int j = 0; j < 3; ++j)
00393         {
00394             if (t[j] < p->nv)
00395                 v[j] = navmesh->getVertex(p->v[t[j]]);
00396             else
00397                 v[j] = navmesh->getDetailVertex(pd->vbase+(t[j]-p->nv));
00398         }
00399         MT_Vector3 tri[3];
00400         for (size_t j=0; j<3; j++)
00401             tri[j].setValue(v[j][0],v[j][2],v[j][1]);
00402         MT_Vector3 a,b;
00403         a = tri[1]-tri[0];
00404         b = tri[2]-tri[0];
00405         normal = b.cross(a).safe_normalized();
00406         return true;
00407     }
00408 
00409     return false;
00410 }
00411 
00412 void KX_SteeringActuator::HandleActorFace(MT_Vector3& velocity)
00413 {
00414     if (m_facingMode==0 && (!m_navmesh || !m_normalUp))
00415         return;
00416     KX_GameObject* curobj = (KX_GameObject*) GetParent();
00417     MT_Vector3 dir = m_facingMode==0 ?  curobj->NodeGetLocalOrientation().getColumn(1) : velocity;
00418     if (dir.fuzzyZero())
00419         return; 
00420     dir.normalize();
00421     MT_Vector3 up(0,0,1);
00422     MT_Vector3 left;
00423     MT_Matrix3x3 mat;
00424     
00425     if (m_navmesh && m_normalUp)
00426     {
00427         dtStatNavMesh* navmesh =  m_navmesh->GetNavMesh();
00428         MT_Vector3 normal;
00429         MT_Vector3 trpos = m_navmesh->TransformToLocalCoords(curobj->NodeGetWorldPosition());
00430         if (getNavmeshNormal(navmesh, trpos, normal))
00431         {
00432 
00433             left = (dir.cross(up)).safe_normalized();
00434             dir = (-left.cross(normal)).safe_normalized();          
00435             up = normal;
00436         }
00437     }
00438 
00439     switch (m_facingMode)
00440     {
00441     case 1: // TRACK X
00442         {
00443             left  = dir.safe_normalized();
00444             dir = -(left.cross(up)).safe_normalized();
00445             break;
00446         };
00447     case 2: // TRACK Y
00448         {
00449             left  = (dir.cross(up)).safe_normalized();
00450             break;
00451         }
00452 
00453     case 3: // track Z
00454         {
00455             left = up.safe_normalized();
00456             up = dir.safe_normalized();
00457             dir = left;
00458             left  = (dir.cross(up)).safe_normalized();
00459             break;
00460         }
00461 
00462     case 4: // TRACK -X
00463         {
00464             left  = -dir.safe_normalized();
00465             dir = -(left.cross(up)).safe_normalized();
00466             break;
00467         };
00468     case 5: // TRACK -Y
00469         {
00470             left  = (-dir.cross(up)).safe_normalized();
00471             dir = -dir;
00472             break;
00473         }
00474     case 6: // track -Z
00475         {
00476             left = up.safe_normalized();
00477             up = -dir.safe_normalized();
00478             dir = left;
00479             left  = (dir.cross(up)).safe_normalized();
00480             break;
00481         }
00482     }
00483 
00484     mat.setValue (
00485         left[0], dir[0],up[0], 
00486         left[1], dir[1],up[1],
00487         left[2], dir[2],up[2]
00488     );
00489 
00490     
00491     
00492     KX_GameObject* parentObject = curobj->GetParent();
00493     if (parentObject)
00494     { 
00495         MT_Point3 localpos;
00496         localpos = curobj->GetSGNode()->GetLocalPosition();
00497         MT_Matrix3x3 parentmatinv;
00498         parentmatinv = parentObject->NodeGetWorldOrientation ().inverse ();             
00499         mat = parentmatinv * mat;
00500         mat = m_parentlocalmat * mat;
00501         curobj->NodeSetLocalOrientation(mat);
00502         curobj->NodeSetLocalPosition(localpos);
00503     }
00504     else
00505     {
00506         curobj->NodeSetLocalOrientation(mat);
00507     }
00508 
00509 }

00560 PyObject* KX_SteeringActuator::pyattr_get_target(void *self, const struct KX_PYATTRIBUTE_DEF *attrdef)
00561 {
00562     KX_SteeringActuator* actuator = static_cast<KX_SteeringActuator*>(self);
00563     if (!actuator->m_target)    
00564         Py_RETURN_NONE;
00565     else
00566         return actuator->m_target->GetProxy();
00567 }
00568 
00569 int KX_SteeringActuator::pyattr_set_target(void *self, const struct KX_PYATTRIBUTE_DEF *attrdef, PyObject *value)
00570 {
00571     KX_SteeringActuator* actuator = static_cast<KX_SteeringActuator*>(self);
00572     KX_GameObject *gameobj;
00573 
00574     if (!ConvertPythonToGameObject(value, &gameobj, true, "actuator.object = value: KX_SteeringActuator"))
00575         return PY_SET_ATTR_FAIL; // ConvertPythonToGameObject sets the error
00576 
00577     if (actuator->m_target != NULL)
00578         actuator->m_target->UnregisterActuator(actuator);   
00579 
00580     actuator->m_target = (KX_GameObject*) gameobj;
00581 
00582     if (actuator->m_target)
00583         actuator->m_target->RegisterActuator(actuator);
00584 
00585     return PY_SET_ATTR_SUCCESS;
00586 }

00588 PyObject* KX_SteeringActuator::pyattr_get_navmesh(void *self, const struct KX_PYATTRIBUTE_DEF *attrdef)
00589 {
00590     KX_SteeringActuator* actuator = static_cast<KX_SteeringActuator*>(self);
00591     if (!actuator->m_navmesh)   
00592         Py_RETURN_NONE;
00593     else
00594         return actuator->m_navmesh->GetProxy();
00595 }
00596 
00597 int KX_SteeringActuator::pyattr_set_navmesh(void *self, const struct KX_PYATTRIBUTE_DEF *attrdef, PyObject *value)
00598 {
00599     KX_SteeringActuator* actuator = static_cast<KX_SteeringActuator*>(self);
00600     KX_GameObject *gameobj;
00601 
00602     if (!ConvertPythonToGameObject(value, &gameobj, true, "actuator.object = value: KX_SteeringActuator"))
00603         return PY_SET_ATTR_FAIL; // ConvertPythonToGameObject sets the error
00604 
00605     if (!PyObject_TypeCheck(value, &KX_NavMeshObject::Type))
00606     {
00607         PyErr_Format(PyExc_TypeError, "KX_NavMeshObject is expected");
00608         return PY_SET_ATTR_FAIL;
00609     }
00610 
00611     if (actuator->m_navmesh != NULL)
00612         actuator->m_navmesh->UnregisterActuator(actuator);  
00613 
00614     actuator->m_navmesh = static_cast<KX_NavMeshObject*>(gameobj);
00615 
00616     if (actuator->m_navmesh)
00617         actuator->m_navmesh->RegisterActuator(actuator);
00618 
00619     return PY_SET_ATTR_SUCCESS;
00620 }
00621 
00622 PyObject* KX_SteeringActuator::pyattr_get_steeringVec(void *self, const struct KX_PYATTRIBUTE_DEF *attrdef)
00623 {
00624     KX_SteeringActuator* actuator = static_cast<KX_SteeringActuator*>(self);
00625     const MT_Vector3& steeringVec = actuator->GetSteeringVec();
00626     return PyObjectFrom(steeringVec);
00627 }
